upcoming_paragraph1: Previously, we shared our planned investigations, but unfortunately we have seen this information being misused by other parties in the same field.
upcoming_paragraph2: Out of respect for our work and to protect our future projects, we have therefore decided not to publicly disclose upcoming locations in advance.
upcoming_paragraph3: But stay tuned – as soon as we have visited and investigated a location, we will publish content here on our website and on our social media channels.
upcoming_paragraph4: Join us for this magical weekend filled with spirituality, inspiration, and community! Mysterium Fair and Beyond Life Party bring together like-minded people who share an interest in the supernatural, personal development, and new experiences.
upcoming_paragraph5: We will also be attending as visitors – so feel free to come say hello! We love talking about exciting experiences, our investigations, and everything related to the paranormal. See you there!
